channel.title: Client Error! (NEED HELP) PLEASE! CAN'T DOWNLOAD ANY CLIENT
channel.description:
Every time i try to download a client this is what comes up... :mad:!!!!
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: EGUI at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
PLEASE HELP ME!!! I'M REALLY TIRED OF THIS! I CANT EVEN DOWNLOAD A SERVER WITHOUT NEEDING A CLIENT. I'll never be able to fix if i can't get some help. So please, try and post.

item.title: Client Error! (NEED HELP) PLEASE! CAN'T DOWNLOAD ANY CLIENT
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“armadyl slayer, post:4, topic:233231”]hmmm… well search for this…

wolf scaper

a few things will pop up then just simply look for the one that says wolf scaper source with client…download client then you’ll be fine :)[/quote]
-.- lol

Read full topic
